topic: 1. National Doctor’s / GST / CA / Postal Worker Day - July 1

subtopics.content:
• Observed in India on July 1, 2025 as Doctor’s Day, GST Day, Chartered Accountants Day, and Postal Worker Day.
• Doctor’s Day honours medical professionals; GST Day recognizes finance professionals and tax reforms; CA Day celebrates chartered accountants; Postal Worker Day recognises postal staff.

subtopics.subtopic: LGBT Awareness & Legal Milestone on July 2, 2025
subtopics.content:
• Observed in India on July 2, 2025.
• Commemorates Delhi High Court’s decriminalization of homosexuality under Naz Foundation v. NCT Delhi case (2009 decision reaffirmed later).

• Celebrated during the first week of July (1–7 July) every year in India.
• Promotes tree planting and environmental conservation at the grassroots level.

• Observed worldwide on July 2, 2025.
• Encourages public interest and awareness of unidentified flying objects and related phenomena.

subtopics.subtopic: Tribute to Spiritual & Academic Teachers on July 10, 2025
subtopics.content:
• Celebrated on July 10, 2025 in India.
• Dedicated to honouring one’s guru or teacher in both spiritual and educational contexts.

• Observed globally on July 11, 2025.
• Highlights population-related issues and policies, promoting sustainable development.

subtopics.subtopic: Malala Yousafzai Advocacy Day on July 12, 2025
subtopics.content:
• Observed globally on July 12, 2025.
• Honors Malala Yousafzai’s activism for girls’ education and women’s rights.

• Observed globally on July 15, 2025.
• Promotes awareness about the importance of equipping young people with skills for employment, decent work, and entrepreneurship.

subtopics.subtopic: Global Tribute to Nelson Mandela on July 18, 2025
subtopics.content:
• Observed globally on July 18, 2025.
• Honors Nelson Mandela’s legacy in peace, freedom, and social justice.

subtopics.subtopic: Commemoration of Bank Nationalization in India on July 19, 2025
subtopics.content:
• Observed in India on July 19, 2025.
• Marks the anniversary of the nationalization of major banks in India in 1969.
• Highlights the role of public sector banks in economic development and financial inclusion.

subtopics.subtopic: Commemorating Victory in Kargil War on July 26, 2025
subtopics.content:
• Observed in India on July 26, 2025.
• Honors the success of Indian Armed Forces in Kargil conflict (1999) and pays tribute to the fallen soldiers.

subtopics.subtopic: Monsoon Festival of Devotion on July 27, 2025
subtopics.content:
• Observed on July 27, 2025 (Sunday) in North India.
• A festival celebrated by women through fasting, rituals, and prayer for marital harmony.

• Observed globally on July 28, 2025.
• Raises awareness about viral hepatitis and encourages prevention, diagnosis, and treatment.

subtopics.subtopic: Conservation Awareness for Tigers on July 29, 2025
subtopics.content:
• Observed globally on July 29, 2025.
• Promotes awareness and initiatives towards tiger conservation and protection of their habitats.

subtopics.subtopic: Birth Anniversary of Tulsidas on July 31, 2025
subtopics.content:
• Celebrated in India on July 31, 2025.
• Honors the poet-saint Tulsidas, author of the Ramcharitmanas.
